title: Senior SAP BTP Developer (DM) - Skövde
description:
**About Justera Group**  

Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.  

  

**About the Role:**  

We are seeking a Senior SAP BTP Developer to join an innovative initiative focused on MTM4 and MTM Next Gen. This role offers the opportunity to work closely with a skilled team, contribute to next-generation solutions, and mentor junior developers.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and maintain applications on SAP BTP.
* Design and implement Fiori apps and SAP UI5 interfaces.
* Apply TypeScript in the development of custom solutions.
* Provide technical guidance and mentoring to the team.
* Collaborate closely with stakeholders to ensure high-quality deliverables.
* 

**Requirements:**

* Proven experience in SAP BTP development.
* Strong knowledge of Fiori and SAP UI5.
* Proficient in TypeScript.
* Experience mentoring and guiding team members
* 

**What We Offer:**

  

* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Systemutvecklare, Örebro
description:
"**Forma framtidens IT-lösningar med VIPAS AB"**


"Vill du vara med och forma framtidens IT-lösningar? VIPAS AB, ett snabbt växande IT-konsultföretag, söker nu kompetenta medarbetare till våra spännande kundprojekt."

**Om VIPAS:**  

"Vi på VIPAS AB kombinerar teknisk expertis med affärsfokus för att leverera lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad. Genom modern teknik som Java och Python och med vår erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling och DevOps skapar vi innovativa, skalbara lösningar som hjälper våra kunder att nå sina mål."

**Jobbeskrivning:**


Konsulten kommer att tillhöra ett agilt leveransteam i rollen som systemutvecklare som idag består av Scrum master, systemutvecklare, testare, kravanalytiker samt produktägare som ansvarar för backloggen. I arbetet ingår både förvaltning av befintliga IT-lösningar men även nyutveckling. Uppdraget kan även omfatta arbetsuppgifter inom andra områden inom vår IT-avdelning. Konsulten ska arbeta under ordinarie arbetstid, som är mellan 06.30-18.30. Det kan vara aktuellt med beredskap, i samband med produktionssättningar. Dessa tillfällen planeras in vid behov tillsammans med it-leveransledare och leveransteamen. Eventuell beredskap ska alltid initieras och beslutas av Transportstyrelsen.

 **Skallkrav:**  

  

Offererad konsult ska uppfylla kraven på kompetensnivå 3. Skallkraven måste uppfyllas för att bli offererad till kund.  

  

Konsulten ska ha:

* minst fyra (4) års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling inom .NET plattformen (.NET Framework och/eller .NET Core/.NET 5+). Erfarenheten ska vara från uppdrag/projekt utförda inom de senaste sex (6) åren räknat från sista anbudsdag.
* minst fyra (4) års dokumenterad erfarenhet av utveckling i C#. Erfarenheten ska vara från uppdrag/projekt utförda inom de senaste sex (6) åren räknat från sista anbudsdag.
* minst tre (3) års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med Microsoft SQL Server, inkluderat utveckling av lagrade procedurer, datamodellering och prestandaoptimering. Erfarenheten ska vara från uppdrag/projekt utförda inom de senaste fem (5) åren räknat från sista anbudsdag.
* minst två (2) års sammanhängande erfarenhet av arbete med både frontend- och backendutveckling i samma projekt eller leveransteam. Frontend kan inkludera ramverk såsom React, Angular eller liknande. Erfarenheten ska vara från uppdrag/projekt utförda inom de senaste sex (6) åren räknat från sista anbudsdag.
* minst fyra (4) års erfarenhet av arbete i agila leveransteam, enligt t.ex. Scrum. Erfarenheten ska inkludera aktivt deltagande i sprintplanering, demo, retrospektiv och dagliga möten. Erfarenheten ska vara från uppdrag/projekt utförda inom de senaste sex (6) åren räknat från sista anbudsdag.
* ha god förmåga att uttrycka sig på svenska i tal och skrift

**MERITERANDE KRAV:**  

  

Följande kriterier är inte obligatoriska, men ger om de är uppfyllda ett mervärde vid Transportstyrelsens utvärdering.  

  

Konsulten bör ha:

* minst tre (3) års aktuell erfarenhet av utveckling i MVC eller Blazor.
* minst två (2) års aktuell erfarenhet av RabbitMQ.
* minst två (2) års aktuell erfarenhet av nServiceBus.
* minst två (2) års aktuell erfarenhet av Microsoft SSIS-paket.
* minst två (2) års aktuell erfarenhet av arbete med systemutveckling i agila team inom statlig myndighet.
* minst två (2) års aktuell erfarenhet av arbete i projekt eller förvaltning som hanterar säkerhetskänslig information, t.ex. person- eller fordonsuppgifter.
* minst två (2) års aktuell erfarenhet av DevOps-relaterat arbete, såsom CI/CD, automatiserade tester och versionshantering (t.ex. Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, Jenkins).

**Krav:**

**Din nästa karriärmöjlighet"**

  

"VIPAS AB erbjuder konkurrenskraftiga anställningspaket enligt Teknikföretagens (Almega) kollektivavtal. Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta i olika branscher, vilket ger både variation och personlig utveckling.
  

  

Som en del av vårt innovativa team får du delta i projekt inom telekom, fordonsindustri, detaljhandel och bank, och bidra till lösningar som formar framtiden."


**"Ta nästa steg i din karriär"**  

"Skicka ditt CV och personliga brev till **kumud@vipas.se** och bli en del av VIPAS AB. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!"

**"Krav på arbetstillstånd"** "Observera att vi endast kan ta emot ansökningar från kandidater med svenskt medborgarskap eller giltigt arbetstillstånd för Sverige."

**"Så tar du nästa steg"**

  

"Skicka in ditt CV och personliga brev och bli en del av vårt innovativa team på VIPAS AB. Vi rekryterar löpande, så skicka gärna din ansökan redan idag för bästa chans!"

title: Integrationsutvecklare
description:
Rollbeskrivning  

Du bygger och driver skalbara mikrotjänster i Kubernetes med fokus på realtidsintegrationer. Uppdraget sker i nära samarbete med plattform- och arkitekturteam och omfattar 100% tjänst.


Arbetsuppgifter

* Designa, utveckla och deploya mikrotjänster i Kubernetes-miljöer med Helm och CI/CD.
* Bygga och konsumera realtids- och händelsedrivna API:er (WebSocket, streaming, gRPC).
* Integrera lösningar med AWS-tjänster som EKS, API Gateway, CloudWatch och IAM.
* Koppla backend-tjänster mot AI-tjänster som hostas i Azure.
* Säkerställa autentisering, auktorisation och dataskydd enligt best practice.
* Etablera mätbarhet och observability i distribuerade system för driftstabilitet.
* Skriva ren, testbar och underhållbar kod samt automatisera kvalitetssäkring.
* Felsöka produktion och driva förbättringar för prestanda, robusthet och kostnad.


Krav

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att bygga och driftsätta mikrotjänster i Kubernetes (EKS, Helm, CI/CD).
* Stark kompetens inom AWS (EKS, API Gateway, CloudWatch, IAM m.fl.).
* Erfarenhet av integrationer mot AI-tjänster i Azure.
* Gedigna backend-kunskaper i Java, Node.js, Python eller likvärdigt.
* Praktisk erfarenhet av händelsedrivna och realtids-API:er (WebSocket, streaming, gRPC).
* Djup förståelse för molnsäkerhet, autentisering/auktorisation och dataskydd.
* Fokus på skalbarhet, resiliens och observability i distribuerade system.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och i samarbete med plattform/arkitekturteam.


Meriterande

* Erfarenhet av event-plattformar och köer (t.ex. Kafka eller Kinesis).
* Infrastructure as Code (t.ex. Terraform eller AWS CDK).
* Service mesh och avancerad trafikstyrning i Kubernetes.
* OpenAPI/AsyncAPI och kontraktsstyrd utveckling.
* Testautomatisering för distribuerade system samt prestanda- och lasttest.
* Erfarenhet av SRE-principer och produktion i högvolymsmiljöer.


Start/Längd  

Start: Omgående  

Längd: 1 år


Plats  

Stockholm (hybrid, 3 dagar/vecka)


Om Rasulson Consulting  

Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med både etablerade teknikbolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda attraktiva karriärmöjligheter för dig som vill utvecklas inom digitalisering och IT. Genom vår djupa tekniska kompetens och vårt omfattande nätverk matchar vi rätt konsult med rätt uppdrag – snabbt och träffsäkert. Hos oss får du personlig rådgivning, kontinuerlig återkoppling och möjlighet att ta nästa steg i din karriär.

**Omfattning:** Heltid, 40 h/vecka  

**Plats:** Uppsala (på plats)  

**Sista dag att skicka in profil:** **måndag 17/11 2025**

**Uppdraget**
-------------


Vår kund inom avancerad instrumentutveckling startar ett nytt projekt och bygger ett samkört **mjukvaruteam**. Vi söker **erfarna egenföretagare/underkonsulter** – totalt **3–4 personer** där **en konsult tar en övergripande lead-/projektledande roll**. Ni jobbar nära hårdvara och service med att utveckla **övergripande systemtestmjukvara** som säkrar kvalitet, stabilitet och snabb felsökning i komplexa instrument.

**Ditt/ert fokus**
------------------

* Utveckla **Component Specific Test Modules (CSTM)** för **övergripande systemtestmjukvara** för instrument.
* Implementera **test executors** och **parameter executors** i **Visual Basic .NET (prioriterat)** eller **C#** (DLL-utveckling).
* Sätta upp **testspecificeringar, mallar och parameterfiler** per instrumentkomponent.
* Integrera mot **kommunikationslager** och säkerställa kompatibilitet med system-/konfigfiler.
* Jobba tätt med **HW R&D** och **embedded** för att koppla fysiska moduler till CSTM.
* Samarbeta med **service** för test och verifiering, samt driva **felsökning och användardialoger**.
* Dokumentera och bidra till **kontinuerliga förbättringar** av test-ramverket.

**Vi söker dig/er som**
-----------------------

* Har **minst 3 års erfarenhet** av **embedded/instrumentnära mjukvara** (lab- eller industrimiljö).
* Behärskar **VB.NET (gärna förstahandsval)** eller **C#** för **DLL** och testautomation.
* Är trygg med **instrumentkommunikation**, **protokoll** och **konfigurationsfiler**.
* Talar och skriver **svenska och engelska** obehindrat.

**Meriterande:** erfarenhet av **CSTM-arkitektur** och **systemtestmjukvara** i instrument-/medtechmiljö, analysutrustning, samt tidigare **teamlead/tech lead**-ansvar.

**Varför detta uppdrag?**
-------------------------

* Direkt effekt på **driftsäkerhet och kvalitet** i högteknologiska instrument.
* **Mjukvara + hårdvara** i nära samspel – konkret, hands-on och tekniskt utmanande.
* Utrymme att påverka **arkitektur, arbetssätt och teststrategi** i ett fokuserat team.

**Så här söker du (enskilt eller som team)**
--------------------------------------------


Skicka till oss:



* **CV (max 3 sidor per konsult)** + **kort pitch** (5–8 meningar) om relevant VB.NET/C#, testautomation och instrumenterfarenhet.


* **Tillgänglighet** (fr.o.m. 12/1 2026) och **timpris**.


* Bekräfta att ni kan **arbeta på plats i Uppsala**.


* Om ni söker som team: ange **vem som tar lead** och hur ni kompletterar varandra.


**Planerad start:** måndag **12/1 2026**.  

Redo att ta uppdraget tillsammans? **Hör av dig med profiler så återkommer vi med nästa steg.**

title: Konsultuppdrag | Senior backendutvecklare Java
description:
**Title:** Senior backendutvecklare till Fordon och Trafik  

**Description:** Vi söker en senior Javautvecklare som ska stärka ett team som bygger framtidens lösningar för operativ trafikkommunikation, såsom positionering av fordon i realtid, stationsdata och tidtabellsdata. Du blir en nyckelspelare i att designa integrationslager och cache-strategier som hanterar hög trafik och belastning utan att påverka databasens prestanda.  

  

**Arbetet innebär att ta fram robusta lösningar för:**  

* Realtidsdataflöden
* Cache-invalidering
* Felhantering
* Hög tillgänglighet


Du samarbetar nära med utvecklare, arkitekter och produktägare för att säkerställa snabb och stabil dataförsörjning till flera visuella gränssnitt.  

  

**Kravprofil**  

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av Java (modern version)
* Gedigen erfarenhet av systemintegration och realtidsdataflöden
* Förmåga att knyta ihop flera system och datakällor på ett robust och skalbart sätt
* Erfarenhet av cache-lösningar för att avlasta databaser
* Förståelse för högpresterande datamodeller och hantering av stora datamängder med låg latens
* Erfarenhet av integrationer, molnbaserade miljöer och Kubernetes

  

**Meriterande**  

* Erfarenhet av visualisering av lägesdata (geo/positionering)
* Kunskap inom pub/sub eller kö-baserad arkitektur
* Erfarenhet av observability och övervakningslösningar för realtidsapplikationer

  

**Start & Omfattning**  

* Start: Början av februari 2026 - 2027-01-29
* Placering: Hybrid – 2–3 dagar på plats i centrala Stockholm
* Omfattning: 100%, 12 månader
* Språk: Svenska och Engelska
 **Om oss**

*Senterprise är ett ledande rekryteringsbolag inom IT och en oberoende förmedlare av frilansande konsulter. Med aktiv headhunting, search och djup teknisk förståelse hjälper vi några av Sveriges främsta arbetsgivare att hitta rätt kandidater, både för anställning och konsultuppdrag.*

*Läs vidare på* *www.senterprise.se*

title: Konsultuppdrag | Fullstack Power BI utvecklare
description:
**Start:** Omgående - 2026-11-30, med möjlighet om ytterligare 12 månader.  

**Ort:** Stockholm/Hyrid

**Språk:** Svenska - starkt meriterande men ej krav

 **Om rollen**  

  

Till vår kund söker vi en fullstack Power BI utvecklare för att vara med och etablera Power BI som ett verktyg. Du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med resten av Data & Analys teamet att sätta upp centrala komponenter som behövs för att kunna nyttja PBI på ett så säkert och effektivt sätt som möjligt.


Idag så nyttjar stora delar av bolaget redan Power BI för deras primära datakällor SAP Business Warehouse och Azure Databricks men med din hjälp så vill de lyfta och forma ambitionen kring verktyget och utöka deras stöd för det.  

  

Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av att sätta upp grundkomponenter för Power BI, både infrastrukturella i deras Azure miljö och administrering i PBI som applikation.  

  

Ditt dagliga arbete kommer att involvera klassiska uppgifter inom data engineering som att skapa semantiska modeller till våra användare men majoriteten av din tid kommer att ägnas åt till att utöka plattformen som Power BI står på.  

  

**Ansvarsomården:**  

  

Implementera och livscykel underhålla infrastruktur som följer deras krav på säkerhet och tillgänglighet:  

* Virtuella Maskiner
* Nätverk: PEP, NSG, Private DNS
* PBI inom Microsoft Fabric in Azure: Workspaces inkl. premiumkapaciteter
* Autentisiering

  

Applikationen PBI Gateway  

  

PBI Administrering  

  

Utveckla och underhålla centrala semantiska modeller i PBI  

* Behörighetshantering som t.ex. RLS
* Prestandaoptimering

  

Utveckla och forma golden path för semantiska modeller och rapporter i PBI  

Utbilda och stötta analytiker att skapa rapporter  

Vidareutveckla och säkerställ att Best practices inom PBI följs  

  

**Kompetenser och färdigheter:**  

  

Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Azure och PBI  

* PBI och Azure arkitektur
* IaC och Terraform
* Git, CI/CD

  

Datamodellering och star schemas  

Programmering i SQL och Python  

Rapportutveckling i Power BI  

  

**Meriterande:**  

  

Erfarenhet av Databricks som plattform  

Erfarenhet av SAP Business Warehouse & SAP Analytics Cloud  

Erfarenhet av finansiell rapportering  

Erfarenhet av tågbranschen  

Erfarenhet av agila ramverk som SAFe. **Om oss**

*Senterprise är ett ledande rekryteringsbolag inom IT och en oberoende förmedlare av frilansande konsulter. Med aktiv headhunting, search och djup teknisk förståelse hjälper vi några av Sveriges främsta arbetsgivare att hitta rätt kandidater, både för anställning och konsultuppdrag.*

*Läs vidare på* *www.senterprise.se*

title: Fullstackutvecklare (.NET eller Java) till IT-konsultbolag
description:
### **Fullstackutvecklare (.NET eller Java) till etablerat IT-konsultbolag**


Vår kund är ett etablerat IT-konsultbolag och webbbyrå med över två decenniers erfarenhet, känt för sin starka kultur som präglas av samarbete, initiativförmåga och självledarskap. Här finns inga traditionella hierarkier – istället bygger framgången på gemensamt ledarskap och nära samspel mellan kollegor, där alla bidrar med sin kompetens och sitt driv.


Som medarbetare får du frihet att driva dina egna projekt och utveckla dina färdigheter, samtidigt som du har tillgång till stöd från erfarna mentorer och ett engagerat team som gärna delar med sig av sin kunskap.  

Företaget värnar om gemenskap och trivsel genom aktiviteter som brädspelskvällar, tech-talks och öppna kunskapsutbyten – en miljö där teknisk skicklighet kombineras med personlig utveckling och arbetsglädje.

### **Vi söker dig som:**

* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet som **Fullstackutvecklare**.


* Har gedigen erfarenhet av **.NET (C#)** eller **Java** i backend.
* Har goda kunskaper inom moderna frontendramverk i TypeScript, React och Next.
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta med **REST API:er**, **SQL-databaser** och **molnlösningar** (Azure, AWS eller GCP).


* Behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift.


* Erfarenhet av **headless CMS** såsom Payload, Sanity, Prismic eller Contentful.

**Kunden erbjuder:**


* Möjlighet att arbeta med **moderna tekniker** i **spännande och varierade projekt**.


* Ett **engagerat och kunnigt team** med stort fokus på samarbete och kunskapsdelning.


* **Flexibilitet och frihet under ansvar** – möjlighet till hybridarbete.


* En företagskultur som uppmuntrar **nytänkande, gemenskap och personlig utveckling**.

title: Software Developer
description:
***Välkommen till MRC Bemanning– bemanning och konsultlösningar för framtiden***


Vi är ett bemannings- och konsultföretag som arbetar brett över flera branscher. Vår drivkraft är att matcha rätt kompetens med rätt uppdrag, oavsett om det handlar om teknik, administration, ekonomi, logistik eller andra områden.

***Vad vi gör***


Vi hjälper företag och organisationer att hitta den kompetens de behöver för att växa – samtidigt som vi erbjuder våra konsulter spännande uppdrag som utvecklar både karriären och individen. Hos oss kan du arbeta i olika roller och branscher, allt beroende på din erfarenhet och vad du själv vill satsa på framåt.

***Vår kultur***


Hos oss är du aldrig ”bara” en konsult. Du blir en del av ett nätverk där vi stöttar varandra, utvecklas tillsammans och där din personliga resa är minst lika viktig som din yrkesroll. Vi tror på öppenhet, gemenskap och att bygga långsiktiga relationer – både med kunder och medarbetare.

***Varför välja oss?***

* Trygga anställningar med kollektivavtal
* Uppdrag i flera olika branscher – du väljer vägen framåt
* Möjlighet till kompetensutveckling och nya karriärvägar
* Ett personligt bemötande – vi ser dig och dina mål

  

Vi på **MRC Bemanning** letar efter passionerade IT-konsulter som vill vara med och göra skillnad – både för våra kunder och för varandra.

***Vad du kommer att göra***


Som IT-konsult hos oss får du arbeta med uppdrag som matchar just din kompetens och dina intressen. Det kan handla om:

* Systemutveckling och programmering
* Cloud-lösningar (Azure, AWS, Google Cloud)
* IT-säkerhet och infrastruktur
* Projektledning och kravställning


Det viktiga för oss är inte exakt vad du gjort tidigare, utan vart du vill utvecklas framåt.

***Vem vi söker***


Vi letar efter dig som älskar IT och vill använda din kunskap för att skapa värde för våra kunder. Du gillar problemlösning, är nyfiken på ny teknik och trivs med att arbeta tillsammans med andra. Vi tror att du har några års erfarenhet inom IT, men det viktigaste är din passion, ditt driv och viljan att växa i konsultrollen.


Skills:

* IBM DB2
* Atrium CMDB
* Firewall
* BMC-Remedy
* MS SQL
* windows server 2022
* Java
* BMC AR System
* Windows Server 2019


English : Advanced


***Vad du får hos oss***

* Spännande och varierande uppdrag hos intressanta kunder
* En arbetsplats med högt i tak, öppen kommunikation och härliga kollegor
* Lön som speglar din erfarenhet

  

Har du frågor? Hör av dig till **Fredrik Steveling** på mail, **fredrik.steveling@mrcbemanning.se** – vi berättar gärna mer om rollen och oss som arbetsgivare.

title: Senior Full-stack Web Developer (WordPress)
description:
Infobric is one of Northern Europe’s leading SaaS companies within Construction Tech. We develop smart tools that simplify the complexity of the construction ecosystem, empowering more than 12,000 companies to gain better control, work more efficiently, and ensure stronger compliance. With more than 300 colleagues across Sweden, Norway, Finland and the United Kingdom - we’re growing fast. We’re now looking for a colleague to join us on our journey to digitalize one of the world’s largest industries.


You’re the kind of person others turn to for guidance, someone who takes full ownership, drives solutions independently, and brings clarity and direction to our web projects. You stay curious, dive confidently into new technologies, and always find a way forward. If you thrive in a dynamic environment where initiative, leadership, and open communication are key, this might be the opportunity for you. With us, you’ll be part of a creative team where you take on exciting challenges and have fun along the way!

**We’re now looking for a Senior Full-stack Web Developer to join our Web team at Infobric Group – someone who combines strong technical skills with a passion for great user experiences and wants to help shape the future of our digital ecosystem.**

#### 
**Your role**


You’ll take a leading role in developing, optimizing, and scaling our WordPress-based commercial web platform, which serves multiple international markets. Working closely with designers, marketers, and stakeholders across the organization, you’ll ensure our websites deliver exceptional performance, accessibility, and user experience - and that they support Infobric’s continued growth.


Your responsibilities:

  

Build and improve high-performing, user-centered websites based on Figma designs and mockup  

* 
* Proactively solve development and design challenges related to UX, SEO, performance, and conversion
* Collaborate across teams to ensure seamless technical implementation (frontend, backend, integrations, tracking, etc.)
* Integrate and optimize third-party systems and services

#### **Who you are**


We’re looking for a curious and driven developer with a strong full-stack mindset someone who thrives on combining clean code with smart design and enjoys taking technical ownership.


**You'll likely have:**

* A minimum 6+ years of professional experience in web development, with deep knowledge of WordPress, preferably gained from working in a larger company.
* Strong skills in PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern web standards
* Familiarity with popular WordPress plugins such as Elementor, WooCommerce, ACF, and Yoast
* Hands-on experience working with APIs, integrations, and scalable architectures
* Solid understanding of UX, SEO, accessibility, web performance, and responsive design
* Proficiency with version control tools such as Git
* Experience collaborating closely with designers in Figma or other design tools
* Familiarity with agile project management
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken, with the ability to communicate clearly across teams and markets

**It's a plus if you have:**

* Worked with WordPress multisite environments, managing shared functionality across multiple sites or markets
* Developed and maintained international and multilingual websites, ensuring localization and performance across regions
* Developed or customized WordPress themes and child themes to create flexible, scalable solutions.
* Understanding of analytics and tracking tools such as GA4, GTM, GSC
* A data-driven mindset, using A/B testing, heatmaps, or behavior analytics tools (like Microsoft Clarity or Hotjar) to evaluate user behavior and drive continuous optimization.
* Fluency in Swedish, both written and spoken, is an advantage for supporting local content and team collaboration, but not a requirement.

#### **What we offer**

* A key role with real influence in a growing digital team within a stable, expanding tech company rooted in the construction industry
* Collaboration with skilled, international colleagues in a culture of openness and creativity. Flat structure with autonomy and ownership
* Office perks including a fully equipped gym, weekly fika, and Friday breakfasts

#### **The team you’ll be joining**


You’ll join a diverse, dynamic Marketing & Web team where openness, collaboration, and continuous development are part of everyday life. This role is fully on-site, giving you the opportunity to work closely with colleagues and immerse yourself in our office culture.

  

Reporting to Victor Cabrera our Web Growth Manager, you’ll play the key role in driving our web development initiatives forward. You’ll also collaborate closely with and provide guidance to our junior web developer, ensuring high-quality execution and technical excellence. We value face-to-face collaboration and team spirit. You’ll drive the work for user-centered, high-performing websites that make it easier for our customers and accelerate our digital growth.

#### **How to apply**


Apply easily using your LinkedIn profile or by attaching your CV. We review applications on an ongoing basis, and the position may be filled quickly – so don’t wait to submit your application!

title: Embedded-utvecklare
description:
**Vi rekryterar just nu en Embedded-utvecklare till ett välkänt Teknikkonsultföretag. Här får du arbeta i en kreativ miljö tillsammans med engagerade kollegor. Det finns möjlighet att arbeta på plats eller på distans. Du väljer vad som passar dig bäst!**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

###

I rollen som **Embedded-utvecklare** får du arbeta med **med den senaste tekniken åt ledande företag.** Beroende på din kompetens kommer vi att kunna matcha ditt starka driv med våra kunders behov. Låter det som något för dig? Då kan du läsa vidare.
  

  

För oss är det viktigt att du som söker tjänsten **drivs av att skapa värde.** Rollen är bred och det finns stora möjligheter att utvecklas. Vi vill att du ska trivas i din roll hos oss! Därför erbjuder vi **kontinuerliga utvecklingssamtal, uppföljningar och utbildningar** för våra anställda. Att ha **kul på jobbet** är också något som vi värderar högt. Vi träffas även lokalt och digitalt flera gånger per år för att bygga gemenskap och utbyta kunskaper och erfarenheter med varandra. Kom och trivs med oss!

### **Vi söker dig som**

* Har **erfarenhet av programmering av inbyggda system**
* Har **goda kunskaper i C/C++**

### **Intresserad?**


Kul! Välkommen med din ansökan **senast 11 december**

title: Core Network as a service Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


Ericsson's 5G core business is launching an innovative and highly dynamic unit that will change how we bring 5G solutions to the market, thus changing the way 5G core is delivered globally. We aim to build and deliver Cloud Native solutions “as a Service” on Hyper Cloud Providers (HCP).

  

You will have the opportunity to spearhead how the public cloud connects with core telco services and help build more elastic and fit-for-purpose capabilities, while venturing new business models. This will fundamentally change how we bring 5G services to the industry, making it more accessible, more versatile, and create new opportunities for innovation.

  

We will bring the standard methodologies of the SaaS industry in the public cloud to the realization of 5G services. We are looking for individuals who want to lead change in the industry, apply the latest technologies to a domain that society relies on day in and day out.

  

Come and join us and lead the industry change!

 **What you will do:**

* End-to-End Development: Drive the full lifecycle of our services, from crafting highly optimized code in Go and C/C++ to building comprehensive automated tests and robust deployment scripts.
* Architectural Excellence: Actively contribute to the design and implementation of secure, scalable, and highly reliable applications and services.
* Automated Delivery: Leverage and enhance our advanced Cloud-Native CI/CD pipelines to streamline and automate the entire software delivery process, from code commit to production.
* Operational Insight: Implement robust monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions to ensure the continuous reliability, availability, and optimal performance of our critical cloud-based applications.
* Innovation & Growth: Continuously learn and apply the latest trends and emerging technologies in cloud computing, actively sharing knowledge and contributing to the continuous growth of our company's technical expertise.
* Collaborative Impact: Thrive in a Lean, Agile, and DevSecOps environment, collaborating closely with your team members to deliver exceptional value to our customers.

 **The skills you bring:**

* Strong Programming Foundation: Strong proficiency in Go and C/C++, coupled with hands-on experience in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform.
* Cloud Native Mastery: Deep practical experience with cloud-native development principles and technologies, including Kubernetes, Docker, and microservices architecture.
* Public Cloud Expertise: Proven experience working with major public cloud platforms such as Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Amazon Web Services (AWS), or Microsoft Azure.
* Networking Acumen: A solid understanding of core network architecture, including experience with Network Function Virtualization (NFV) and Software-Defined Networking (SDN).
* Security First Mindset: Strong understanding and practical application of network security principles and best practices.
* DevOps & Automation: Hands-on experience with modern development platforms and CI/CD tooling, specifically GitHub and GitHub Actions.
* Collaborative Spirit: You thrive in a collaborative, generative team culture, actively supporting your teammates and prioritizing customer success.
* Problem Solver & Learner: A curious mind with exceptional problem-solving skills, a passion for continuous learning, and a creative approach to technical challenges.
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city: Göteborg or Stockholm**

**Req ID:** 775360

title: Backend Developer Intern   [Remote]
description:
**About XR Solutions** 




 XR Solutions is a technology-driven company pioneering
 **machine learning-powered augmented reality solutions** 
 for industrial clients.
 



 Our mission is to revolutionize how machines are operated, maintained, and optimized — enabling workflows and innovations that were once impossible. We combine research-based optimizations with cutting-edge AR technology to create
 **practical, reliable, and high-performance solutions** 
 that reshape industries.
 



 This internship offers a rare opportunity to
 **build backend systems that directly power advanced AR applications** 
 used in real-world industrial environments.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We’re looking for a
 **passionate, detail-oriented Backend Developer Intern** 
 with a strong interest in

 .

title: Back End Developer
description:
*Do you want to play a key role in building the digital backbone of the Nordics? At GlobalConnect, we are looking for a Backend Developer to join our Content Delivery Network team in Stockholm. You will be part of a dedicated group that delivers video and content distribution services to millions of people across Denmark, Norway, Finland, and Sweden.* 




  





**About The Role** 




 As a Backend Developer in our Video Streaming & Content Delivery team, you will design, develop, and implement solutions that support large-scale video and radio distribution. You will work in an agile team with experienced colleagues, close to stakeholders across development, operations, and customer support. The role combines technical depth with real customer impact, ensuring reliability, scalability, and efficiency in systems that matter.
 



  





 While our focus is on Content Delivery Network and video streaming technologies, you do not need previous experience in this field. If you bring solid backend development skills and curiosity, we will help you grow into the domain.
 



  





**Why this matters?** 




 GlobalConnect is the digital backbone of society in the Nordics and northern Germany. Our CDN & Origin services enable leading broadcasters, media houses, and partners to distribute content on a scale. By joining us, you will help safeguard connectivity and deliver streaming experiences that millions of people rely on every day.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain backend systems for video and radio encoding, packaging, and distribution
* Contribute to the design and scaling of GlobalConnect’s CDN and origin services
* Collaborate closely with other development teams, network and datacenter colleagues, and support functions
* Troubleshoot, optimize, and maintain services in production
* Work in an agile setup with freedom under responsibility



  





**What You Need To Succeed** 



* Minimum 3 years of experience as a backend developer (Java preferred)
* Knowledge of distributed systems and network protocols (TCP/IP, HTTP)
* Skills in at least one systems-oriented programming language (C, C++)
* Solid knowledge of GNU/Linux, including configuration and troubleshooting



  





**Good to have** 



* Experience with big data (Hadoop ecosystem or similar), SQL/NoSQL databases, streaming protocols (HLS, DASH, SRT/MPEG-TS, RTMP), CI/CD, load testing, Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ, or automation tools such as Ansible, Puppet, or Chef.
* Swedish language skills are a plus.



  





**The team and why GlobalConnect** 




 You will join a team of 16 specialists, including five developers, who have worked together for many years. The team values collaboration, autonomy, and close customer relationships. We are proud to serve more than 120 customers, including some of the most recognized media companies in the Nordics. At Globalconnect, you will experience a culture of trust, learning, and proactivity.
 



  





**Process** 




 We review applications continuously. A CV is enough; a cover letter is not required unless you want to highlight something not covered in your CV or LinkedIn.
 



  





**Join us** 




 If you want to help shape the digital backbone of the Nordics and work with systems that truly matter, we look forward to your application.
 



  





**About Us** 




 GlobalConnect is one of the leading connectivity providers in Northern Europe. We’re 2000 passionate and talented individuals who want to make a difference, turning our customers’ visions into reality through connectivity. Our goal is to create the best possible conditions for engaged employees, a place where you can develop and grow, and create unforgettable memories and enjoyable experiences.
 



  





 We have helped develop and digitize societies across the Nordics for more than two decades. Our purpose is what drives us to continue - turning visions into reality by empowering society with connectivity.

title: ServiceNow CSDM Developer
description:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform
* Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards
* Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products
* Be a productive member of the team.


 Requirements
   

  

* Over 5 years of hands-on experience in ServiceNow CMDB and CSDM (version 3.0 or later) implementation and management.
* Strong proficiency in JavaScript, Glide API, and ServiceNow configuration for customizing and optimizing platform functionalities.

title: Software Integration Engineer
description:
**About Applied Intuition**
 Applied Intuition is the vehicle intelligence company that accelerates the global adoption of safe, AI-driven machines. Founded in 2017 and now valued at $15 billion following its recent Series F funding round, Applied Intuition delivers the Vehicle OS, Self-Driving System, and toolchain to help customers build intelligent vehicles and shorten time to market. 18 of the top 20 global automakers and major programs across the Department of Defense trust Applied Intuition's solutions to deliver vehicle intelligence. Applied Intuition services the automotive, defense, trucking, construction, mining, and agriculture industries and is headquartered in Mountain View, CA, with offices in Washington, D.C., San Diego, CA, Ft. Walton Beach, FL, Ann Arbor, MI, London, Stuttgart, Munich, Stockholm, Bangalore, Seoul, and Tokyo. Learn more at applied.co.
   

  

*We are an in-office company, and our expectation is that employees primarily work from their Applied Intuition office 5 days a week. However, we also recognize the importance of flexibility and trust our employees to manage their schedules responsibly. This may include occasional remote work, starting the day with morning meetings from home before heading to the office, or leaving earlier when needed to accommodate family commitments. (Note: For EpiSci job openings, fully remote work will be considered by exception.)*
**Meet our engineers on the Vehicle OS team!**
 Vehicle OS is a flexible suite of products that help vehicle manufacturers develop, deploy, and update complete vehicle software and AI applications. Learn more about what the team is building, the team culture, and why it’s one of the most exciting projects at Applied Intuition.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a software integration engineer who can champion the delivery of features in our newest product. This involves working across software and hardware to ensure that the full system is integrated together seamlessly when it needs to be delivered to the customer.
   

  

**At Applied Intuition, you will:**
* Deliver full-system features that span software and hardware that meet customer requirements
* Directly interact with the customers to identify the target use-cases, then manage the project to complete the integration
* Work cross-functionally with the product, software, mechanical and electrical teams to develop and deploy systems
* Develop a deep understanding of the entire system architecture and how the software and hardware components interact
* Design and bring up test rigs needed for end-to-end testing and validation of system performance
* Test and troubleshoot integration between various components to ensure reliability


**We're looking for someone who has:**
* 2+ years of experience in software integration or development
* An understanding of electronic systems and how how to setup and debug them
* Experience with developing or testing software applications
* Software development experience in Python or C/C++
* Familiarity with Linux development and Bash scripting


**Nice to have:**
* Experience in the automotive industry and working with automotive technologies including CAN, LIN, Ethernet, Simulink, AUTOSAR, etc
* Experience interacting with customers to deliver projects that meet their requirements
* Experience developing software for large projects (CI/CD, release process, etc)
* Familiarity with developing software for embedded systems
* Skills in other adjacent areas (CAD/3D printing, PCB design, etc)


**Benefits and** 
**perks** 
 :
   

  

* Lunch and dinner allowance
* Fitness (600 USD) and learning stipends (1,000 USD) annually
* Stock options


*Don’t meet every single requirement? If you’re excited about this role but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway. You may be just the right candidate for this or other roles.*
*Applied Intuition is an equal opportunity employer and federal contractor or subcontractor. Consequently, the parties agree that, as applicable, they will abide by the requirements of 41 CFR 60-1.4(a), 41 CFR 60-300.5(a) and 41 CFR 60-741.5(a) and that these laws are incorporated herein by reference. These regulations prohibit discrimination against qualified individuals based on their status as protected veterans or individuals with disabilities, and prohibit discrimination against all individuals based on their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or national origin. These regulations require that covered prime contractors and subcontractors take affirmative action to employ and advance in employment individuals without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status or disability. The parties also agree that, as applicable, they will abide by the requirements of Executive Order 13496 (29 CFR Part 471, Appendix A to Subpart A), relating to the notice of employee rights under federal labor laws.*

title: Backend Developer
description:
**Who we are 🏃** 




 Findity is a tech provider fueling Europe’s leading edge in expense management solutions! We empower over 30,000 corporate entities and more than 300,000 employees to conquer their financial challenges with ease. Join us in revolutionizing how businesses thrive in the digital age!
 



  





**What we do🚀** 




 At Findity, we constantly strive to eliminate expense management for every individual and business so they can focus on what truly matters. Expense management is for many a must and not a want, that is why we partner with the leading software and financial institutes to eliminate the pain of dealing with expenses.
 



  





**The role 🙋** 




 We are now looking for a skilled, driven and experienced Backend Developer to join our team of creators, constantly raising the benchmark on expense management. Though working behind the scenes, our backend developer will have a great effect not only on our business success but also on the success of our partners. Simply put, our ideal candidate should have a blend of technical expertise, insatiable curiosity, and an analytical mindset.
 



  





**What you will do 🙌** 



* Participare and take ownership in the day to day work in the scrum team
* Design and implement robust integration solutions to connect with various external systems, specifically focusing on bookkeeping and salary platforms
* Regularly communicate with project managers, stakeholders, quality assurance teams, and other developers regarding advancements on the technology roadmap
* Collaborate closely with internal teams to understand their data exchange needs and ensure seamless, accurate data flow between our core systems and external financial platforms
* Develop ideas for new integration products, features, or efficiencies by following industry developments, emerging technologies, and trends in financial system interoperability



  





**Qualifications 📝** 



* Great understanding in the development process and design patterns
* A minimum of three years of experience in Java or other similar languages
* An academic background in a relevant field
* Good knowledge of relational databases
* Experience with Git-based version control
* Experience in using postman or other API tools
* A drive and doer attitude that is not afraid to take on challenging tasks
* A curiosity to learn and grow professionally
* Ability to work independently as well as in a team
* Great attention to detail as well as good problem solving and communication skill



  





 Bonus for Us if you have worked with some of below tech:
 



 Grails, MariaDB/ MySQL, Docker/ Kubernetes, GitLab, Python, Javascript Angular/ Typescript, Jira, Kafka and/or Ubuntu.
 



  





**Apply Now!** 




 Excited about embarking on your new career journey? Fantastic! Send us your application in English as soon as possible!

title: Software Engineer - Zalando Logistics Technology (ZEOS) - All Genders
description:
Over the last years, we learned that solving fulfilment related challenges for the good of our customers helps us to fuel the growth of our platform. With more partners in Partner Program and Connected Retail joining our platform, we have been developing and testing additional fulfilment services tailored to their needs.
   

  

 The ZEOS Logistics department is responsible for all partner-facing Zalando Logistics Solutions. By unifying and collaborating these services under a single umbrella, we provide a more holistic approach to delivering the optimal fulfilment solution to meet our partners' needs and leverage common services to enable partner program growth.
   

  

 As a Software Engineer in ZEOS Logistics, you will develop and operate business-critical applications for our partners and internal stakeholders that process tens of thousands of events per second powering the critical partner-facing backend APIs and web applications of the partner fulfilment domain. You will work with tools and technologies such as Java, Kotlin, PostgreSQL, AWS, Kubernetes, and Elasticsearch in building high-performance, low-latency systems to create an impact on customers and partners.
   

  

**INCLUSIVE BY DESIGN**
 At Zalando, our vision is to be the starting point for fashion - one that is inclusive by design. We only assess candidates based on qualifications, merit, and business needs. We welcome applications from people of all gender identities, sexual orientations, personal expressions, racial identities, ethnicities, religious beliefs, and disability statuses. We only want to know why you’re great for this role, so please avoid including your picture, age, and marital status in your CV as well.
   

  

 We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Please feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support and assist you throughout the hiring process.
   

  

 do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy
   

  

 https //corporate.zalando.com/en/diversity-inclusion
   

  

 Our employee resource groups
   

  

 https //corporate.zalando.com/en/diversity-inclusion/our-employee-resource-groups
   

  

**WHAT WE’D LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)...**
* Build and operate large-scale data streaming and processing applications serving fulfilment process relevant data with the latency of tens of milliseconds in magnitude to Zalando partners in using technologies such as Java, Kotlin, Postgres, and Elasticsearch.
* Use a state-of-the-art software development methodology.
* Be part of a newly established engineering team in Stockholm and help to foster an environment of continuous learning.


**WE’D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF..** 
 .
   

  

  

* 5+ years of experience as a Software Engineer in developing APIs and high-volume data streaming and processing systems with either Java or Kotlin.
* Initial hands-on experience with SQL storage technologies.
* Familiarity with AWS, Kubernetes, and Elasticsearch is in addition a plus.
* "You build it, you run it" approach you have had a first experience in managing services end-to-end, from developing to deploying to monitoring and incident support is a big plus.
* Passion for working in an agile, cross-functional team, iterating quickly during the product development cycle. As well as, ability to communicate and collaborate effectively with business stakeholders, product managers, and engineering peers.


**OUR OFFER**
 Zalando provides a range of benefits, please ask your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about what we offer.
   

  

**About Zalando**
 It’s the perfect time to join Zalando on our journey, from being a pioneer in the world of e-commerce, to the starting point for fashion in Europe. We connect customers, brands, and partners across 23 markets.
   

  

 Help us drive digital and sustainable solutions for fashion, logistics, advertising and research, bringing head-to-toe fashion to almost 49 million active customers through a team of diverse skill-sets, cultural backgrounds, and interests.
   

  

 Our values https //jobs.zalando.com/en/our-founding-mindset
   

  

 do.More - our sustainability strategy https //corporate.zalando.com/en/sustainability Follow us on Instagram instagram.com/insidezalando
   

  

 Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form - we do not accept applications via email.

title: Integration Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* 2-4 years of hands-on experience with API Management and/or Apache Kafka
* 3-5 years of experience in Java
* Hands-on experience with PostgreSQL.
* Proficiency in GitHub Actions and Ansible Tower for automation.
* Hands-on experience with Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) with a strong understanding of Kubernetes clusters.
* Familiarity with Linux and WSL environments.
* Knowledge of Splunk, Fluent Bit, and Helm charts.
* Experience in Angular, JavaScript and Bash scripting is a plus


**Application deadline:** 
 19-11-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*
